rows.label: qst102211_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, so you're the one
Nicc was talking about.

rows.label: qst102211_msg0002
rows.name:
You fought alongside Vandham, right?
I've heard a lot about you.

rows.label: qst102211_msg0003
rows.name:
My name is Kathira.
I'm one of the old hands around here.

rows.label: qst102211_msg0020
rows.name:
Nicc is awfully cautious for
such a young man.

rows.label: qst102211_msg0021
rows.name:
Though Chief Corden always says
I'm too rough and ready, so maybe
we'll balance each other out!

rows.label: qst102211_msg0101
rows.name:
You're looking for a
Tarnish Apple?

rows.label: qst102211_msg0102
rows.name:
I think I've seen those in the central
part of the cavern, the area with
all the spores flying around.

rows.label: qst102211_msg0301
rows.name:
Just hand the ingredients over to Nicc.
Ahh, I'm dying of hunger here!

rows.label: qst102211_msg0201
rows.name:
Wheeeeeew, I'm stuffed!
That was good grub!

rows.label: qst102211_msg0202
rows.name:
The next part of the mission is gonna
be a toughie, but after a meal like that
I feel ready for anything!
